      • givenXP

        public int givenXP()
        Description copied from class: Entity
        Accessor method for the given XP of an entity. This is basically here for monsters only, since the only way players can get to monsters is as an entity.
        Overrides:
        givenXP in class Entity
        Returns:
        The given XP upon death of this entity.
